name: Director Morse
description:
In Director Morse, you will direct a fleet of (two) robots around a wintery

wonderland in order to harvest candy canes, using only the power of your morse key! MUHAHAHA
Keys: TAB : Switch robot Any other key : enter morse

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 34 (December 11th-14th, 2015) where the theme was "Two Button Controls".
